snippet: TRENT--Paul, 1936-2016, on February 5. Beloved husband of Sandra, loving father of Katherine and Adrien. Devoted grandfather to Vachagan, Anahit, Joshua, Allegra and Daisy. Interment was at King David Cemetery, New York. 1/3
lead_paragraph: TRENT--Paul, 1936-2016, on February 5. Beloved husband of Sandra, loving father of Katherine and Adrien. Devoted grandfather to Vachagan, Anahit, Joshua, Allegra and Daisy. Interment was at King David Cemetery, New York. 1/3
